snippet.title: SEGA Vintage Collection: Monster World (XBLA) - Xbox 360 Gameplay
snippet.description:
Captured off the Xbox One. 

This Xbox Live Arcade compilation brings together the original arcade version of Wonder Boy in Monster Land, its Mega Drive version and Monster World IV. This 360 release includes the ability to switch between the English and Japanese versions, achievements (200G) and save states. And of course, it's backward compatible on the Xbox One and Series X|S.

SEGA Vintage Collection, Monster World, Wonder Boy in Monster Land, Monster World IV (C) SEGA
Developed by M2
Also released as individual titles on PlayStation 3 (PSN)

#xbla #xboxlivearcade #xbox360 #retrogames #retrogaming #sega #xboxgaming #xbox360games #xbox360gameplay #backwardcompatibility #xboxone #xbox #xboxseriess #xboxseriesx #theforeseenarcade #segavintagecollection #monsterworld #monsterland #wonderboyinmonsterland #wonderboy #monsterworldiv

FUN FACT: Since all SEGA Vintage Collection games will be delisted on 06/12/2024, one of the five SVC titles, Alex Kidd & Co., was delisted before any of the others.
